author: Reuters
title: China reports rise in asymptomatic coronavirus cases, vows tighter border controls
description: Imported cases and asymptomatic patients, who show no symptoms but may still be able to pass the virus on, have become China's chief concern after draconian containment measures succeeded in slashing the overall infection rate.
content:
Mainland China vowed to tighten controls at its land borders on Monday as the government reported a surge in new asymptomatic coronavirus cases.  
The National Health Commission said on Monday that 78 new asymptomatic cases had been identified as of the end … [+3480 chars]
